scripts.start: concurrently -n dev,rm-env "cp config/local/.env.local .env.local && cp config/.env .env && react-scripts start " "sleep 15 && rm .env.local && rm .env"
scripts.build: cp config/production/.env.production .env.production && cp config/.env .env && react-scripts build && rm .env.production && rm .env
scripts.staging: cp config/development/.env.development .env.development && cp config/.env .env && react-scripts build
